title: Women's Boho Floral Print Midi Dress Short Sleeve Summer Long Dress
description: Crafted from premium, lightweight fabric, this maxi dress effortlessly drapes over your body, ensuring a comfortable and flattering fit.
This luxury party dress features a shaped double waistline and plunge neck with hidden buckle details, a delicate puff long sleeve.
The floral watercolour print design adds a playful and vibrant touch, adding a touch of allure to your look.
Whether you're attending a glamorous wedding, a beach party, or even a romantic date night, this dress will make you the center of attention.
Paired with chic heels or dressed down with sandals for more relaxed moments, you will look absolutely exquisite in this beautiful maxi dress!
